query:
INSERT INTO fca_devotionals (title, content, scripture, scripture_ref, author, publish_date, featured, category, prayer, views, likes, shares)
VALUES (
  'Finding Strength in the Storm',
  'As athletes, we face challenges that test our limits every day. Whether it is a tough practice, a difficult opponent, or the pressure of competition, we need a source of strength that goes beyond our physical abilities. Today scripture reminds us that our true power comes from Christ. When you step onto the field, court, or track today, remember that you are not alone. God is with you in every sprint, every play, every moment.',
  'I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.',
  'Philippians 4:13',
  'Chad A. Dozier',
  CURDATE(),
  'yes',
  'Strength',
  'Lord, thank You for being my strength when I am weak. Help me to rely on You in every competition. Amen.',
  0, 0, 0
)
